artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Jean-Florentine Defraine; Artist: after Charpentier; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Fashion periodical with green paper covers bound with two hand-colored engravings of people in fashionable period dress and a hand-colored engraving of a chair
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Seconde Année, Vingtième Cahier, 30 Mai 1787
